show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita's Chronicle of the Moon Exploration
other_title: Doraemon - Il film: Nobita e le cronache dell'esplorazione della Luna (Italian)
Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Getsumen Tansaki (Japanese)
映画ドラえもん のび太の月面探査記 (Japanese)
電影哆啦A夢：大雄的月球探測記 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: A mysterious boy named Luca shows up as a transfer student in Nobita's class. Nobita and Luca go to the Rabbit Kingdom that they built on the far side of the moon using one of Doraemon's secret gadgets. There, they meet kids with the mysterious power called 'espal.'
